page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: Teachers and pupils of St.Stephens and All Martyrs C.E.Primary School. Teachers and pupils of Harwood C.E. Primary School. Teachers and pupils of Moorgate C.P. School. Teachers and pupils of Breightmet C.P. School. Teachers and pupils of Crompton Fold C.P. School. Teachers and pupils of The Moss C.P. School. Also parents of children at these schools, without whose help the project would have been impossible. Co-ordinated and edited by Mrs. V. Culley and Mr. T.H.Gorman from the The Moss C.P. School.
